title: Jordan Pundik from New Found Glory
itunes:title: Jordan Pundik from New Found Glory
description:
So excited to be bringing you this conversation I had with the lead singer of New Found Glory, Jordan Pundik. He invited me over to his house and we had a conversation in his backyard about singing, identity within a band and surreal moments he's had. It's an insightful chat that I encourage you to listen to. This episode is presented exclusively by Audible, the internets leading provider of audiobooks, visit audiblepodcast.com/100words for a FREE AUDIOBOOK. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
